MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:56am. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Woodcroft Clinton Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
